name: Wendigo
resistance: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Natural Hunter
traits.desc: The Wendigo has advantage on Stealth checks made while it is hunting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Wendigo makes one claw and one bite attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: +7 to hit (+9 when bloodied), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage; 13 (1d12 + 6) slashing damage when bloodied.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: +7 to hit (+9 when bloodied), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage; 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage when bloodied. If a target is bitten, it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw.  It takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

legendary.name: Move (costs one point)
legendary.desc: The Wendigo moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Bite (costs two points)
legendary.desc: The Wendigo makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Shriek (costs three points)
legendary.desc: The Wendigo screams.  Each creature that can hear it within a 30 ft. radius must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw.  On a failure, the creature becomes stunned for one minute.  The creature can remake the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.  If a creature succeeds on the save, it is immune to the Wendigo's shriek for the next hour.
